data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and Companys Code of Conduct for prevention of Insider Trading and Code of Practices for fair disclosure of UPSI the Trading Window for dealing in securites of the Company shall remain closed with effect from Wednesday October 1 2025 till the expiry of 48 (Forty Eight) hours after the financial results of the Company for the First and Second quarter ended June 30 2025 and September 30 2025 are generally made available to the public.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Trualt Bioenergy Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 03 2025 the equity shares of Trualt Bioenergy Ltd (Scrip Code: 544545) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. .20251001- dated October 01 2025.
